price: 15. Nay! Surely they (evil-doers) will be veiled from seeing their Lord that Day.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
